actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to pay compensation to producers of fruits or vegetables for economic losses resulting from the destruction or quarantine of plants or plant products carried out to control plant pests in emergencies.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of Agriculture to compensate producers of fruits and vegetables grown in the United States for economic losses incurred as a result of quarantine or destruction of such fruits or vegetables carried out to control plant pests in emergencies.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to pay compensation to producers of fruits or vegetables for economic losses resulting from the destruction or quarantine of plants or plant products carried out to control plant pests in emergencies.
